/build/run.zig

pub const RunStep = struct
fields:
src
step: Step
src
builder: *Builder
See also addArg and addArgs to modifying this directly src
argv: ArrayList(Arg)
Set this to modify the current working directory src
cwd: ?[]const u8
Override this field to modify the environment, or use setEnvironmentVariable src
env_map: ?*BufMap
src
stdout_action: StdIoAction = .inherit
src
stderr_action: StdIoAction = .inherit
src
stdin_behavior: std.ChildProcess.StdIo = .Inherit
src
expected_exit_code: u8 = 0

src
pub const StdIoAction = union(enum)
fields:
src
inherit
src
ignore
src
expect_exact: []const u8

expect_matches: []const []const u8

pub const Arg = union(enum)
fields:
src
Artifact: *LibExeObjStep
src
WriteFile: struct {
            step: *WriteFileStep,
            file_name: []const u8,
        }
src
Bytes: []u8
funcs
src
fn create(builder: *Builder, name: []const u8) *RunStep
src
pub fn addArtifactArg(self: *RunStep, artifact: *LibExeObjStep) void {
    self.argv.append(Arg{ .Artifact = artifact }) catch unreachable;
    self.step.dependOn(&artifact.step);
}
src
fn addWriteFileArg(self: *RunStep, write_file: *WriteFileStep, file_name: []const u8) void
src
pub fn addArg(self: *RunStep, arg: []const u8) void {
    self.argv.append(Arg{ .Bytes = self.builder.dupe(arg) }) catch unreachable;
}
src
pub fn addArgs(self: *RunStep, args: []const []const u8) void {
    for (args) |arg| {
        self.addArg(arg);
    }
}
src
pub fn clearEnvironment(self: *RunStep) void {
    const new_env_map = self.builder.allocator.create(BufMap) catch unreachable;
    new_env_map.* = BufMap.init(self.builder.allocator);
    self.env_map = new_env_map;
}
src
fn addPathDir(self: *RunStep, search_path: []const u8) void
src
fn getEnvMap(self: *RunStep) *BufMap
src
fn setEnvironmentVariable(self: *RunStep, key: []const u8, value: []const u8) void
src
pub fn expectStdErrEqual(self: *RunStep, bytes: []const u8) void {
    self.stderr_action = .{ .expect_exact = self.builder.dupe(bytes) };
}
src
pub fn expectStdOutEqual(self: *RunStep, bytes: []const u8) void {
    self.stdout_action = .{ .expect_exact = self.builder.dupe(bytes) };
}
